I want to work on my chess tournament preparation workspace

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731047000000_c5h7e9s1t", "workspaceId": "ws_1731047000000_c1h2e3s4t", "sessionDescription": "Training for State Championship tournament - aiming for 1800+ USCF rating", "sessionMemory": "Current rating: 1685. Training 2 hrs daily: tactics puzzles (Chess.com 2100 rating), opening repertoire study (Caro-Kann defense, London System), endgame fundamentals. Analyzed 15 games from recent club tournaments. Working with coach weekly. Tournament in 8 weeks. Weaknesses: time management, knight endgames.", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to review yesterday's coach session notes and practice Caro-Kann variations", "primaryGoal": "Achieve 1800+ USCF rating and place top 10 at State Championship", "subgoal": "Master Caro-Kann main lines, improve tactical vision speed by 20%"}, "id": "ws_1731047000000_c1h2e3s4t"}
